prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: A text description of the video to generate

seconds.title: seconds
seconds.description: Duration of the video in seconds

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Resolution quality. Standard is 720p, high is 1024p

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the video. Portrait is 720x1280, landscape is 1280x720

openai_api_key.title: Openai Api Key
openai_api_key.description: Optional: Your OpenAI API key. If you use your own OpenAI API key, you will be charged directly by OpenAI.

input_reference.title: Input Reference
input_reference.description: An optional image to use as the first frame of the video. The image must be the same aspect ratio as the video.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: A text description of the video to generate

seconds.title: seconds
seconds.description: Duration of the video in seconds

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the video. Portrait is 720x1280, landscape is 1280x720

openai_api_key.title: Openai Api Key
openai_api_key.description: Optional: Your OpenAI API key. If you use your own OpenAI API key, you will be charged directly by OpenAI.

input_reference.title: Input Reference
input_reference.description: An optional image to use as the first frame of the video. The image must be the same aspect ratio as the video.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Omit for random generations

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to start generating from. Ideal images are 16:9 or 9:16 and 1280x720 or 720x1280, depending on the aspect ratio you choose.

last_frame.title: Last Frame
last_frame.description: Ending image for interpolation. When provided with an input image, creates a transition between the two images.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from the generated video

reference_images.title: Reference Images
reference_images.description: 1 to 3 reference images for subject-consistent generation (reference-to-video, or R2V). Reference images only work with 16:9 aspect ratio and 8-second duration. Last frame is ignored if reference images are provided.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Omit for random generations

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to start generating from. Ideal images are 16:9 or 9:16 and 1280x720 or 720x1280, depending on the aspect ratio you choose.

last_frame.title: Last Frame
last_frame.description: Ending image for interpolation. When provided with an input image, creates a transition between the two images.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from the generated video

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Omit for random generations

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to start generating from. Ideal images are 16:9 or 9:16 and 1280x720 or 720x1280, depending on the aspect ratio you choose.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from the generated video

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements

enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.description: If set to true, the prompt optimizer will be enabled

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Video aspect ratio. Ignored if an image is used.

last_frame_image.title: Last Frame Image
last_frame_image.description: Input image for last frame generation. This only works if an image start frame is given too.

reference_images.title: Reference Images
reference_images.description: Reference images (1-4 images) to guide video generation for characters, avatars, clothing, environments, or multi-character interactions. Reference images cannot be used with 1080p resolution or first frame or last frame images.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements

enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.description: If set to true, the prompt optimizer will be enabled

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Omit for random generations

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to start generating from. Ideal images are 16:9 or 9:16 and 1280x720 or 720x1280, depending on the aspect ratio you choose.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from the generated video

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 10 seconds is only available for 768p resolution.

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Pick between 768p or 1080p resolution. 1080p supports only 6-second duration.

first_frame_image.title: First Frame Image
first_frame_image.description: First frame image for video generation. The output video will have the same aspect ratio as this image.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Video aspect ratio. Ignored if an image is used.

last_frame_image.title: Last Frame Image
last_frame_image.description: Input image for last frame generation. This only works if an image start frame is given too.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 10 seconds is only available for 768p resolution.

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Pick between standard 512p, 768p, or pro 1080p resolution. The pro model is not just high resolution, it is also higher quality.

last_frame_image.title: Last Frame Image
last_frame_image.description: Last frame image for video generation. The final frame of the output video will match this image.

first_frame_image.title: First Frame Image
first_frame_image.description: First frame image for video generation. The output video will have the same aspect ratio as this image.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the video. Ignored if start_image is provided.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Things you do not want to see in the video

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank for random

num_frames.title: Num Frames
num_frames.description: Number of video frames. 81 frames give the best results

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Resolution of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px

optimize_prompt.title: Optimize Prompt
optimize_prompt.description: Translate prompt to Chinese before generation

frames_per_second.title: Frames Per Second
frames_per_second.description: Frames per second. Note that the pricing of this model is based on the video duration at 16 fps

interpolate_output.title: Interpolate Output
interpolate_output.description: Interpolate the generated video to 30 FPS using ffmpeg

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated video.

lora_scale_transformer.title: Lora Scale Transformer
lora_scale_transformer.description: Determines how strongly the transformer LoRA should be applied.

lora_scale_transformer_2.title: Lora Scale Transformer 2
lora_scale_transformer_2.description: Determines how strongly the transformer_2 LoRA should be applied.

lora_weights_transformer.title: Lora Weights Transformer
lora_weights_transformer.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet (for example, 'https://huggingface.co/Viktor1717/scandinavian-interior-style1/resolve/main/my_first_flux_lora_v1.safetensors')

lora_weights_transformer_2.title: Lora Weights Transformer 2
lora_weights_transformer_2.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer_2. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. Can be different from transformer LoRA.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

image.title: Image
image.description: Image to use for the first frame of the video

effect.title: effect
effect.description: Special effect to apply to the video. V5 supports effects. Does not work with last_frame_image.

quality.title: quality
quality.description: Resolution of the video. 360p and 540p cost the same, but 720p and 1080p cost more. V5 supports 1080p with 8 second duration.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 8 second videos cost twice as much as 5 second videos. V5 supports 1080p with 8 second duration.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements in the video

last_frame_image.title: Last Frame Image
last_frame_image.description: Use to generate a video that transitions from the first image to the last image. Must be used with image.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the video. Ignored if start_image is provided.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Things you do not want to see in the video

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

reference_tags.title: Reference Tags
reference_tags.description: An optional tag for each of your reference images. Tags must be alphanumeric and start with a letter. You can reference them in your prompt using @tag_name. Tags must be between 3 and 15 characters.

reference_images.title: Reference Images
reference_images.description: You must give at least one reference image. Up to 3 reference images are supported. Images must be between 0.5 and 2 aspect ratio.

image.title: Image
image.description: First frame image for optional image-to-video generation

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt describing the video to generate

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds. Durations longer than 10 seconds are only available with 1080p resolution.

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Resolution quality of the generated video

image.title: Image
image.description: Image to use for the first frame of the video

vibe_style.title: vibe_style
vibe_style.description: Style for the overall vibe of the video. Ignored if image is provided.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the output video. Ignored if image is provided.

lighting_style.title: lighting_style
lighting_style.description: Style for the lighting of the video. Ignored if image is provided.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt used for the video generation

shot_type_style.title: shot_type_style
shot_type_style.description: Style for the shot type of the video. Ignored if image is provided.

color_theme_style.title: color_theme_style
color_theme_style.description: Style for the color theme of the video. Ignored if image is provided.

frame_interpolation.title: Frame Interpolation
frame_interpolation.description: Smoothly blend frames for fluid video transitions

image.title: Image
image.description: First frame image for optional image-to-video generation

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt describing the video to generate

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Resolution quality of the generated video

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation.

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to generate video from.

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Whether the video should loop, with the last frame matching the first frame for smooth, continuous playback.

concepts.title: Concepts
concepts.description: List of camera concepts to apply to the video generation. Concepts include: truck_left, pan_right, pedestal_down, low_angle, pedestal_up, selfie, pan_left, roll_right, zoom_in, over_the_shoulder, orbit_right, orbit_left, static, tiny_planet, high_angle, bolt_cam, dolly_zoom, overhead, zoom_out, handheld, roll_left, pov, aerial_drone, push_in, crane_down, truck_right, tilt_down, elevator_doors, tilt_up, ground_level, pull_out, aerial, crane_up, eye_level

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

end_image.title: End Image
end_image.description: An optional last frame of the video to use as the ending frame.

start_image.title: Start Image
start_image.description: An optional first frame of the video to use as the starting frame.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video
